title: Regitered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Morris Heights Health Center
Interview Descriptions: I was called by HR to set up an interview with the Program director. Then I was called back to meet the medical director. They have you the opportunity to meet potential coworkers and asked them questions and tour clinics and then was offered the position.
Interview Questions: What would you do in this situation? Was regarding patient safety

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Morris Heights Health Center (New York, NY) in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: My interview was so good. It was professional, but I  no shape or form was it intense. Im usually so nervous at interview but she made me feel very comfortable. I look forward to working there. Im so excited.

title: Dentist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Morris Heights Health Center (Bronx, NY) in Feb 2020
Interview Descriptions: Interview with director, manager, and associate dentist. Get a tour of the facilities and sometimes get to meet other providers. Asks questions about past experience, your mission, your ability to work without 4-handed dentistry
Interview Questions: What kind of procedures are you comfortable with?

title: Dentist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Morris Heights Health Center (Bronx, NY) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: Met with Directors, Dentist, HR, Medical Director-INTERVIEW PROCESS TOOK TOO LONG, HR delays in communication, waited for responses and offers. It took months before they finally got back to me but by then, I accepted a different position.
Interview Questions: what are your clinical strengths and weaknesses

title: Program Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Morris Heights Health Center (New York, NY)
Interview Descriptions: after a personal reference recommended me, I submitted my resume to the Program Director. I was called for an interview with Vice-President and Director within a week of my email and received the offer call within 3 days, met with HR and went through a drug test.  Was working with in 3 weeks of interview.
Interview Questions: How I would handle a difficult staff.

title: Switch Board Operator Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Morris Heights Health Center
Interview Descriptions: I was brought in to meet my potential supervisor, I was asked a series of questions; including my past employers, very friendly people overall, after I was interviewed I was told that the position was mine.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in a few years?

title: Family Support Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Morris Heights Health Center (Bronx, NY) in Nov 2015
Interview Descriptions: My friend gave my resume to a supervisor. I was called with two days she interviewed within 2 weeks. I was hired on the spot but the actual process with HR took about a month and done change.
Interview Questions: What are some places you would do outreach.

title: Case Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Morris Heights Health Center (Bronx, NY) in Jun 2015
Interview Descriptions: It was quick and easy. The application was alot of documents. But it was straight forward. I was called for an interview, i went in. I was asked a few questions. Based on the job. I was offered job then and there.

title: Certified Nurse Midwife Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Morris Heights Health Center (Bronx, NY) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: They have the "managers" come in for group interview.  It is all a lie.  They make you seem like they are very organized and supportive, but they undermine the employees every step of the way.
Interview Questions: Lots of questions about cultural sensitivity issues.

title: Business Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Morris Heights Health Center (Bronx, NY) in Jun 2013
Interview Descriptions: Process took about one month, from my initial interview to my starting date. Individual interview follow-up with a group interview. Very Team work oriented. Relax interview setting. I felt comfortable and relax.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 Years?
